resources.string: To change the Theme you have to restart the App afterwards
To change your name please click here
Cannot connect to the MoveSense device

This app demonstrates how to connect to the Movesense sensor.
 - First scan for BLE devices and then connect to it by clicking it on the list.
 - Connected devices are shown on the list with ***.
 - Clicking on connected device will show device info.
 - Long click on connected device will disconnect.

You can track your runs daily with this app.
 You can track your route via GPS and the heartbeat via an external sensor.
 You can review this at My Runs.
 You can also make predictions about the next run.
 If you do not want the app to use your GPS location or Bluetooth, you can prohibit this under Settings.
 Please also enter a name under Settings.
Here you can see details about the last run:
Please go to My Runs and click on the first run to see more information.
To delete this run, please click on the button in the bottom left corner.
You are running this run so you can not see the details.
You are running this run so you can not start a new run.
You GPS is switched off so you can not start a new run. Please go to settings and turn it on
This function is not available on this phone
